settings.tab1_content:
Happy Being is made to be a part of your daily ritual:

  1. In the morning as a replacement of juices which are high in sugar and calories.
  2. In the afternoon as a non-caffeinated midday pick-me-up.
  3. In the evening as a healthy alternative to alcohol.

settings.tab3_content:
Sure, words like "polyphenols" might sound complicated, but they're just active antioxidants that've been protecting human health since forever.

Polyphenols are found in plants like blueberries, and they help your cells to fight inflammation & keep you healthy.

We didn't create polyphenols. Nature did. We just figured out how to pack enough of them into a white tea to make a long-lasting impact on your health.
